NUEVAS HISTORIAS QUE AHONDAN EN EL PASAD: NEW STORIES THAT DELE INTO HELLBOY'S PAST AS AN AIDP AGENT
Una nueva edición de Brujería y demonolo: A new edition of Gustav Strobl's Witchcraft and Demonology wreaks havoc. A ghost haunts a mass grave. Woody's doubts as AIDP cryptozoologist. A were-tiger threatens a town in India. There is something hidden in an old laboratory of the Heliopic Brotherhood of Ra. An invocation to celebrate the new year. Six new adventures from Hellboy's past.
